channel.title: Made an ownage client for server yet
channel.description:
How can I make it so people NEED to use my client to play. I don't want them using a shitty client that makes my server look like shit =D.
PEACE

item.title: Made an ownage client for server yet
item.dc:creator: @delicious delicious
item.description:
@delicious wrote:

Well, you would not give the ip, and make it so you client connects to that automatically. That way, they have to donlaod the client in order to see the ip.

Read full topic
item.source: Made an ownage client for server yet
